description:
This application is a HP webOS city guide to accompany you on your visit to New York City.

It contains a constantly upgraded OFFLINE database of points of interest including museums as well as tourist attractions.  The database is regularly updated and all updates are free. 
It currently contains approximately 60 locations.

With help from your GPS it will indicate the disance and direction to the nearest sight.

This application operates completely offline meaning you don't have to connect to the internet to locate the destination.

An optional link will locate the spot for you in google maps allowing you to get directions to the selected destination.  Note that this will require an internet connection which may incur roaming fees.

We hope you like it and hope you have a great visit in the world's best loved city!

Note, if you have any recommendations or suggestions, please feel free to let us know!
Regards,
John
